price: ߕߎ߬ߢߊ ߘߏ߲߬ ߝߘߊߣߴߌ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߟߋ߬ ߟߊ߫، ߏ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߌߟߋ ߞߊߣߊ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߛߌߞߊߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߝߋ߲߫ ߘߌ߫
arabic: ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ فَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُمۡتَرِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: al-ḥaqu min rabbika falā takūnanna mina al-mum'tarīna
